page.title: 19A CHILD'S LEISURE WEST BATH
page.content: Usually after school I change into my play clothes,then call for my friend. Much of the time we go on our roller boots.We enjoy this because the road has just been made smooth.Other times we go for a ride on our bikes or a short walk. One of my hobbies is reading.Every week I go to the library to fetch four new books.My best author is Enid Blyton.Her best series is Mallory Towers about a girl who goes to a boarding school. When I am by myself I like to play with my pets.I have one hamster and three goldfish.Most evenings I watch 2 hours of television.At 21.00 I have a wash and get ready for bed.Mum comes up and says"Good-night" and I read for half an hour.Then I sleep.
